name: Scuba Dive
description:
Cant finish it in time but I have learn a lots from this Game Jam under the theme 'Lost and Found'.   

I got an idea from viral clip video about people scuba in the river and found some phone or wallet and try to give them back to it's owner.

Feature that I done.

- dive  -detect  -map -shop

Feature left

-unlock new map -new detect item  -obstacle such as trap or aggressive fish.

PS. actually I have a problems a little bit that made me have time only 27 hours.

PS2. love ya global game jam
